About Me

A little bit about what I do

Your projects are in safe hands


15 years’ experience in IT and a solid history in implementing IT solutions in the Engineering, Logistical, Manufacturing and Public Sectors including FTSE 100 companies. Conceptualised and managed full software development lifecycle projects ranging from £50,000 to £18 million in budget and managed multiple teams ranging from 3 to 34 FTE. Coming from a technical background and backed by multiple Agile / Project Management certifications and years of experience, I am more than prepared to get the job done.
